mapper.select:
select bim.id,bim.photo_time,bim.pic_url,bim.up_time,bim.problem_type,bim.content, x_coordinates, y_coordinates, bim.h_coordinates,uses.user_name from bim_enclosure bim left join sys_user uses on bim.user_id = uses.user_id
AND bim.problem_type like concat('%', #{problem_type}, '%')

select user_name, problem_type, up_time, content,pic_url from bim_enclosure bim left join sys_user uses on bim.user_id = uses.user_id where 1=1
AND bim.id =#{id}
AND bim.x_coordinates like concat('%', #{x_coordinates}, '%')
AND bim.y_coordinates like concat('%', #{y_coordinates}, '%')
AND bim.h_coordinates like concat('%', #{h_coordinates}, '%')
mapper.insert: insert into bim_enclosure( x_coordinates, y_coordinates, h_coordinates, pic_url, photo_time, problem_type, user_id, content, up_time )values( #{x_coordinates}, #{y_coordinates}, #{h_coordinates}, #{pic_url}, #{photo_time}, #{problem_type}, #{user_id}, #{content}, sysdate() )
